title: I’ll Take Responsibility for My Friend, the Duke! - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Childhood Promise   Engagement   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Magic   Manipulative Characters   Time Skip
author: Mochimochiko   もちもちこ
description:
Al, my childhood friend, was of the duke’s family that held great power. In addition to his high specs, he was also a very beautiful person. He was someone like that, and yet, he got hurt while protecting me.

Really, his special ability should be able to heal his injuries completely… The scars left on his arms… I have no words.

If he says, “Won’t you take responsibility?”

“I will take responsibility.”>
